text: I had just built a pavilion at the end of my garden, and I heard a mole reasoning with a bee: "What a beautiful work", said the mole, "it must be a very powerful mole that built it". "You're kidding me", said the bee, "the architect of this piece was a great bee. Since that day I've decided never to argue. Finished Philosophical Dictionary, 1764
title: Dios
author: nan Voltaire
